    • Method Detail

      • build

        public int build(boolean aFullBuild,
        boolean aBPChanged,
        HashSetArray<SourceFile> aSFs)
          throws ZamiaException,
                 java.io.IOException
        If aFullBuild=false and the build path has not changed in a significant way (adding or removing toplevels is ok, everything else will trigger a full build), this tries to do an incremental build based on the given set of changed source files. if that fails (e.g. a package was changed), returns -1 otherwise returns the number of rebuilt nodes. if a full build is done this will return 0
        Parameters:
        aChanged -
        Returns:
        number if rebuilt nodes or -1 if full build is required or 0 if full build was done
        Throws:
        ZamiaException
        java.io.IOException
